description:
Mail REAL one-of-a-kind cards without a trip to the store! Create and send cards straight from your iPhone or iPad, and you can even schedule a delivery date so your cards arrive right on time - perfect for the upcoming holiday season.

SEND ONE-OF-A-KIND CARDS.
Create cards with photos from your iPhone or iPad, and add filters, stickers, and other personal touches with just a few clicks. From birthday cards to photos you just want to send because you took an amazing Instagram photo, Ink has designs for any occasion:

- Holiday
- Christmas
- Birthday
- Thank You 
- Grandparents
- Baby
- Wedding
- Invites 
- Anniversary & Love
- Thinking of You
- Travel
- Congrats
- Halloween
- Valentine's Day
- Holidays

Ink’s large, 5x7-inch cards are printed on thick, glossy card stock at a resolution of 300 dpi (that’s printing-nerd-speak for “super nice paper”), and they cost just $1.99 each (including postage!). Buy in bulk to save even more. 

YOU CREATE, WE DELIVER.
- Cards are delivered to the US, UK, Europe, and Canada in 2-5 business days, and to anywhere else in the world in two to three weeks. 
- Receive order and delivery email notifications so you know exactly where your card is. 
- Every card is guaranteed for your satisfaction. If your card gets lost, damaged, or somehow leaves you less-than-wowed, we will send another or return your money. 

Download this FREE app and we can’t wait for you to make someone’s day! 

----- Contact Us ----- 
We’d love to hear from you. Unless your delivery person wasn’t as hunky as you expected. 
Website: http://www.sincerely.com/ink 
Twitter: twitter.com/InkCards
Facebook: www.facebook.com/InkCards
Email: team@sincerely.com 
Phone: (888) 260-4005 (9 a.m.-6 p.m. Pacific, Monday through Friday)

releaseNotes:
Bug fixes and improvements

Also released in version 5:

We've updated our app to support iOS 8, iPhone 6, and 6 Plus.

We've also fixed a bug in scheduled delivery.

Now our app is stronger, faster, and more responsive. It’s even easier to send Ink Cards to your loved ones!
